description.narrative: • Support youth with disabilities to become job-ready through soft skills and employability training, including mock-interviews, CV development, mentorship and offering linkages to market-relevant skills training providers. • Link youth with disabilities to employability training and employment opportunities through the Riziki Source mobile application. • Engage employers to use Riziki Source as an inclusive hiring platform and offer training on best practices related to inclusion to ensure that youth are appropriately supported for on-the-job learning in their transition into the labour market.
